text.text_translated: Over the last ten years, many major supermarkets have faced strong criticism for various unethical actions. They have wasted a lot of food, paid their suppliers too little, and used too much plastic for their packaging, which has had a bad effect on our environment. However, supermarkets are now starting to pay attention to this problem. In response to a strong negative reaction from customers about the huge amount of waste from plastic packaging, some of the biggest UK supermarkets have made a promise to change their packaging and reduce the amount of plastic they use.
